api_list.name: Create a Page
api_list.description:
Create a Notion page
Requirements:
1. Integration Token
2. Database ID (in body)
See: [Notion integrations guide](https://developers.notion.com/docs/getting-started)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notion42.p.rapidapi.com/v1/pages/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notion42.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create a database
api_list.description:
Create a Notion database in a page
Requirements:
1. Integration Token
2. Page ID (in body)
See: [Notion integrations guide](https://developers.notion.com/docs/getting-started)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notion42.p.rapidapi.com/v1/databases/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notion42.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
